For the purpose of avoiding overfitting and incresing model stability, K-fold Cross Validation sampling method is applied before all the model fitting. There are two steps for the K-fold Cross Validation: <br />
1. Decide the proportion for the train, validate and test set. 
2. Set the fold number, K.
